modName: STVC - The Skyrim Total Voice Control project
summary:
Not so much a stand-alone mod as it is a method for integrating several other mods to enable ALMOST TOTAL voice control of your Skyrim experience!

...it\'s just something I did for myself that I thought might be worth sharing ;)
descriptionHtml:
[size=\"5\"][color=\"#FF0000\"] [font=\"Verdana\"]HOT, HOT NEWS! [/font][/color][/size]

I\'ve just secured a VERY special deal for STVC users....

You can now get VAC for HALF PRICE!

Just download the \'VAC offer for STVC\' file (tiny!) from the bottom of my \"Files\" page & follow the simple instructions to get lifetime VAC registration & support for a mere, measly NINE DOLLARS!

...That\'s only GBP 5.84 or Euros 7.07 at todays\' rates.

Payment is by PayPal so you know it\'s safe.

You\'ll get your registration by email, usually within an hour (but it can take up to 10 hours if the Author is asleep!)

HOW CAN YOU RESIST?

......................................................................

[size=\"5\"][color=\"#FF0000\"] [font=\"Verdana\"]STVC 1.3.1.266 Expansion released. [/font][/color][/size]
 - Fast-&-loose expansion pack for STVC with shouts & dual-wielding. Detailed instructions & video to follow. ONLY for people who know what they\'re doing! (9Jan12)

[size=\"5\"][color=\"#FF0000\"] [font=\"Verdana\"]STVC 1.3.0 updated to include latest VAC 2.6.6 (8Jan12) [/font][/color][/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------
[size=\"4\"][color=\"#C35617\"][url=http://vimeo.com/34381594]VAC Tutorial Video (17 minutes)[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kd9pU1iNAT0&hd=1]STVC In-Game Demo (4 minutes)[/url][/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------
This will not only change the way you PLAY Skyrim but will also change the way you THINK ABOUT Skyrim:- FOREVER!

...From load-screen to final \'quit\', just about everything you used to do with your keyboard can now be done with the power of YOUR OWN VOICE!

- SO much more immersive than breaking combat to menu-scroll-and-equip through your inventory/menus screens or fumbling for that seldom used hotkey!

The only thing better would be true \'thought control\' and we\'re years away from that, denk ik.... 

(or finding the \'secret portal to Tamriel\' in your basement - A man can dream, can\'t he?)

From now on your left hand will ONLY be concerned with moving your feet & your right hand with where you\'re looking & using what\'s in your hands.
-------------------------------------------------------------
[PURPOSE OF THE PROJECT]

To provide support, guidance & advice for all VAC users w.r.t. Skyrim.

To provide a complete, player-friendly guide for seamless integration of all the best \'hotkey\' modz for a more immersive Skyrim experience.

--------------------------------------------------------------
[THE COMPLETED PROJECT WILL INCLUDE:-]

*GAME COMMANDS- Open doors & locks, take, give & drop items, create/craft weapons/armour/potions/enchanted items, talk to NPCs etc.-
*MOVEMENT- Sneak, walk, run, sprint, autorun-
*MENUS- Map, Journal, Inventory, Magick, Skills & Favourites - Plus \'menu navigation\'.
*WEAPONS/SPELLS - Your normal eight \'favourites\' hotkeys (1-8) -

**DUAL_WIELD - Four genuine \'on-hand/off-hand\' combos for wepaons, shield & spells-
**ARMOUR - Three complete \'costume changes\' inc rings, circlets & amulets-
**SHOUTS - Ten of your available dragon-shouts, summoned & delivered at will!-

***SPELLS & SHOUTS - The remaining ten shouts plus up to 20 hot-keyed spells, potions, weapons or artifacts with extra voice-commands to give extra dual-wielding & \'deadly combos\'.
***CONSOLE - Re-animate your follower, get \'red cross parcels\', even go \'body flying\'.
***ADVANCED - Converse with/control/trade with your NPCs & your Horse by voice command.

-ALL WITH JUST A FEW WORDS INTO YOUR STANDARD DESKTOP MIKE/HEADSET/WEBCAM-
.................................
* Available NOW as 1.3.0.266 full instal.
**Available NOW as 1.3.1.266a Expansion. This is curently the quick-instal version without full docs or tutorial video, if you\'re a \'noob\' have a little patience & wait for the \'Full Instal\' version.
*** Coming soon. May be delayed if the CK is actually released on time, coz then this place will be empty!
................................
-------------------------------------------------------------

...it\'s just something I did for myself that I thought might be worth sharing ;)

I\'m not a coder or an artist or any other kind of genius, I\'m just an \'umble industrial engineer, I suppose that maybe qualifies me to work out how to get things to do things that their creators didn\'t actually envision them doing when they created them ;)

(I\'ve been doing THAT for decades ITRW, btw)

The ONLY credit I deserve is in bringing other peoples\' work together in one place, with a novel slant. I URGE you to endorse their work long before you praise my meagre contribution.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

DOWNLOAD STVC_1.3.0.266_FULL CONTAINS:

- Detailed, player-friendly step-by-step configuration instructions including links to \'YouTube\' demos & how-to clips.

- Authorised 30-day full-feature trial version of VAC 2.6.6

- 3 Pre-configured .xml VAC profiles.

- Printer-friendly key/command crib sheets.

DOWNLOAD STVC_1.3.1.266a_QuickInstal CONTAINS:

- minimal documentation

- Script Dragon, SuitSwitch & ShoutHotKeys files (with permission of authors)

- VAC .xml profile & cribsheet for the \'alt1\' shouting method

- custom .ini for shouthotkeys

- VAC 2.6.6 instalation file in case you haven\'t upgraded yet!

- Special half-price offer details for VAC Registration.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WARNINGS: (VERY IMPORTANT!)

1) Everything included & written about this project is geared towards a LEGAL & ENGLISH \"PC/Windows version\" of the Skyrim program, updated to the current limit (1.3.10 at present) - DO NOT EVEN ASK about any version of Skyrim which doesn\'t conform to this standard. (I can cast \'very-painful-lingering-horrible-death-WITHOUT-ANY-HOPE-OF-RESISTANCE\' on ANYONE who even tries to \"pake the tiss\" over this -  NO SH!T.) Also, it is written for people using the game with a keyboard & mouse. I\'ve never used a \'360 controller\' so I can\'t advise on one, can I?

-Let\'s just say that this project is written for \'grown-ups\' ;)

2) This project is dependent upon, and committed to, an application called VAC - Voice Activated Commands - by Shift_E.

I appreciate that there are a lot of you out there who want \'everything for nothing\' or you\'re not interested. Fair enough, it\'s your money.

But I ask you all to consider this-

VAC is not Skyrim-specific, it can control ANY keyboard-driven game or application on your PC. It was written in 2008 by a fellow-gamer who is still devoted to it\'s development & support. There are 20 pre-made profiles available for modern classics like CoD, ArmA & Wolfenstein. It is powerful, flexible & easy to use once you\'ll spent a little time with it.

\'Lifetime support\' is just USD 18/Euros 13.48/GBP 11.54 by PayPal 
(Exchange rates may change!)

I happily bought it after just 6 days of my 30-day full-feature trial. I\'m looking forward to using it with \"FarCry3\", when it\'s finally released, too.

At the invitation of the author, I\'ve also just accepted the offer to \'help out\' on the VAC support forum. 

NO, I\'m not getting any \'kickbacks\'!

AFAIK there are currently NO freeware apps available with the features of VAC. There are a few which cost 4, 6, 8 times what VAC does though.

 
3) This ain\'t no \'ego thang\', I\'d just like to share what I\'ve done FOR MYSELF with everyone else who\'d like to try do the same for themselves. I\'m no \'expert\' (- definition of an expert - an \'ex\' is a has-been & a \'spurt\' is a drip under pressure!) but I\'m willing to spend SOME valuable playing-time with those people who need a little help in understanding \'what needs to be done\' in order to get this thing 100% working on their rig.

4) - READ THE F*****G MANUALS GUYS, FFS!
